mapper.select: select `id`,`hospital_name`,`hospital_number`,`hospital_alias`,`hospital_inform`,`hospital_grade`,`hospital_weight`,`type_id`,`city_id`,`activation_flag`,`order_weight`,`create_user`,`create_time`,`update_user`,`update_time`,`delete_user`,`delete_time`,`del_flag` from base_hospital where id = #{value} and del_flag = '0'

select `id`,`hospital_name`,`hospital_number`,`hospital_alias`,`hospital_inform`,`hospital_grade`,`hospital_weight`,`type_id`,`city_id`,`activation_flag`,`order_weight`,`create_user`,`create_time`,`update_user`,`update_time`,`delete_user`,`delete_time`,`del_flag` from base_hospital where hospital_name = #{value} and del_flag = '0'

select `id`,`hospital_name`,`hospital_number`,`hospital_alias`,`hospital_inform`,`hospital_grade`,`hospital_weight`,`type_id`,`city_id`,`activation_flag`,`order_weight`,`create_user`,`create_time`,`update_user`,`update_time`,`delete_user`,`delete_time`,`del_flag` from base_hospital where hospital_number = #{value} and del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(), '-', '') as id from dual
insert into base_hospital ( `id`, `hospital_name`, `hospital_number`, `hospital_alias`, `hospital_inform`, `hospital_grade`, `hospital_weight`, `type_id`, `city_id`, `activation_flag`, `order_weight`, `create_user`, `create_time`, `update_user`, `update_time`, `delete_user`, `delete_time`, `del_flag` ) values ( #{id}, #{hospitalName}, #{hospitalNumber}, #{hospitalAlias}, #{hospitalInform}, #{hospitalGrade}, #{hospitalWeight}, #{typeId}, #{cityId}, #{activationFlag}, #{orderWeight}, #{createUser}, #{createTime}, #{updateUser}, #{updateTime}, #{deleteUser}, #{deleteTime}, #{delFlag} )
